Package helper

Class AppointmentsQuery

java.lang.Object
helper.AppointmentsQuery
public class AppointmentsQuery extends Object
This class contains SQL queries pertaining to appointments.

    • potentialOverlaps

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> potentialOverlaps(int customerID, LocalDate date) throws SQLException
      This method selects all appointment start and end times on a given day. This list is passed to a method that compares the start and end times with a new appointment's.
      Parameters:
      customerID - a given customer ID
      date - the date of the new appointment
      Returns:
      an observable list of appointments
      Throws:
      SQLException - if query not found
